name: udemy-ask-v2-barebones-starter

scripts.deploy-skill: npm run private-get-skill-manifest && npm run private-get-interaction-model && npm run private-deploy-skill && cd ./infrastructure/lambda/code && npm run update-lambda-code-dev && cd ../../../
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && npm install && cd ../%npm_package_config_lambdaDirName% && npm install
scripts.make-cdk-app: mkdir ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && cd ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && npx cdk init --language typescript && npm run build
scripts.synth-stack: cd ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && npm run build && npx cdk synth
scripts.deploy-dev-stack: cd ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && npx cdk synth && npx cdk deploy %npm_package_config_stackNameDev% --profile  %npm_package_config_devProfile%
scripts.deploy-prod-stack: cd ./infrastructure/%npm_package_config_infrastructureDirName% && npx cdk synth && npx cdk deploy %npm_package_config_stackNameProd% --profile %npm_package_config_prodProfile%

author: Adonous Tech LLC
description: Serverless application package for Alexa Skills built with ASK CLI and ASK CLI V2 and TypeScript
